content:
Don't search love in others
Don't expect the truth
That is pure
Be sure
You will disappoint
Just devote your love
To others
A smile spread, on your face
For everyone
Live for others
Help for others
Die for others
That is real happiness
That is true love
That is pure life
But it is very hard
To understand
To do all that
It is the naked truth
It is the naked truth
cleaned: don t search love others don t expect the truth that pure be sure you will disappoint just devote your love others a smile spread your face everyone live others help others die others that real happiness that true love that pure life but it very hard understand do all that it the naked truth it the naked truth
